sourcesContent:
/*! ========================================================= * Argon Dashboard React - v1.1.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-react * Copyright 2019 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/argon-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; import {Redirect} from "react-router-dom"; import "../../assets/css/custom.css" // reactstrap components import { Badge, Card, CardHeader, Media, Table, Container, Row, Button, Col, Progress, } from "reactstrap"; // core components import Header from "../../components/Headers/Header.js"; import Maps from "./Maps_Component.js" function fix_date(st) { let date = st.split('T'); let year = date[0]; let time = date[1].split('.')[0]; return [year,time]; } class Tables extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { table_data : [], table_buttons:[], table_page:1, num_accidents:0, num_to_show:10 } } redirect_to_details = (index) => { return } getData = async (id) => { const response = await fetch( `/num_accidents` ); const result = await response.json(); this.setState( prevState => ( { num_accidents : result } ) ); console.log(this.state.num_accidents); const response1 = await fetch( `/range_accidents/${id}` ); const result1 = await response1.json(); this.setState( prevState => ( { table_data : result1 } ) ); } /* Sets status colors * 0 -> red (this accident was not answered yet) * 1 -> yellow (emergency services are on their way) * 2 -> green (accident resolved) */ setStatus = (value) => { if (value === 2) { return ( ) } else if (value === 1){ return ( ) } else { return ( ) } } renderArray = (value,index) => { return( {fix_date(value["date"])[0]}
{fix_date(value["date"])[1]} {value["location"]["address"]} {value["n_cars_involved"]} {value["n_people"]} {value["n_people_injured"]} {value["damage"]}
{this.setStatus(value["status"])} ) } renderButtons(){ const elements = ['one', 'two', 'three']; const items = [] for (const [index, value] of elements.entries()) { items.push(
  • {value}
    • ) } return(
    • this.handleClick(e,this.state.table_page-1)}>
    • this.handleClick(e,1)}>1
    • this.handleClick(e,2)} >2
    • this.handleClick(e,3)}>3
    • this.handleClick(e,this.state.table_page+1)}>
    ) } componentDidMount() { this.getData(1); } handleClick = (e,id) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(e); this.state.table_page=id this.getData(id); }; render() { return ( <>
    {/* Page content */} {/* Dark table */}

    Accidents

    {this.renderButtons()}
    Date/Hour Nº cars Nº people Nº injured Severity Status
    {this.state["table_data"].map(this.renderArray)}
    Date/Hour
    Location
    Nº cars
    Nº people
    Nºinjured
    Severity
    Status

    • 1
    • 2
    • 3
    Date/Hour Nº cars Nº people Nº injured Severity Status
    ); } } export default Tables;
